title: Can't add outlook.com email or a google based email
content: I've been using TB for years. Recently, I uninstalled it to try other mail clients. I decided to get TB working again but I'm incredibly frustrated that I'm unable to get an outlook.com account and my nexamortgage.com account working. The NEXA account is google based and is usually quite easy. I also have a Keller Williams account that is also Google based and that worked fine on TB just before I tried to setup my NEXA account. I have tried to enter both manually and have tried multiple different IMAP, SMTP Port settings and Server settings, but nothing is working.
creator: chunnel
